sect2.title: Global Structures
sect2.para: Below is a description of general requests and results which include plugin-specific ones.

para.programlisting: <complexType name="MapRequest"> <all> <element name="mapId" type="xsd:string"/> ...elements specific to plugins... </all> </complexType>

listitem.para: mapId - map ID, ie. project name and mapfile name separated by a point
channel - type of message: 1 = end user, 2 = developer

para.programlisting: <complexType name="MapResult"> <all> <element name="timestamp" type="xsd:integer"/> <element name="serverMessages" type="types:ArrayOfMessage" minOccurs="0"/> ...elements specific to plugins... </all> </complexType>

listitem.para: timestamp - timestamp which identifies the server configuration. If this timestamp changes, it means server configuration changed and a call to method getMapInfo is required to get latest version (see ).
serverMessages - list of messages returned by server
